title: Your device requires a security update
message:
### A friendly reminder from your local IT team 

 Your device will restart during this update 

 Updates can take around 30 minutes to complete 

 ### Important Notes 

 A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure that IT can accurately protect your device. If you do not update your device, you may lose access to some items necessary for your day-to-day tasks. 

 To begin the update, simply click on the Update Device.
infobox:
### Required OS Version: 13.4

Current Version: 13.1  
 Days Remaining to update: 1  
 Deferred Count: 999
